com.oceanoptics.omnidriver.features.ls450functions

Interface LS450_Functions


  • public interface LS450_Functions
    Interface to give access to operations for the USB-LS450. The USB-LS450 is an integrated, multi-purpose LED light source module designed for use with the USB2000/USB4000 Spectrometer, a small-footprint, plug-and-play spectrometer that plugs into the USB port of any desktop or notebook PC. Intended device is the USB-LS450.

    • Method Detail

      • setLEDMode

        void setLEDMode(boolean pulsed)
         throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the LED to either CW or pulsed operation. The Pulse rate of the LED is determined by the Continuous Strobe signal from the USB2000. Typically this rate is 976Hz. The LED is also Enabled/Disabled by the Lamp/Strobe Enable command/signal.

        0 -- CW Mode
        !0 -- pulsed Mode

        Parameters:
        pulsed - a boolean value to set to pulsed operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the plugin cannot communicate with the spectrometer.

      • getLS450Coefficients

        LS450Coefficients getLS450Coefficients()
        Gets an array containing the 19 calibration coefficients for the LS450. This method gets the object only and does not read from the LS450, Equivalent to the "Load Button" Calls getInfo, which returns a String for each constant.
        Returns:
        returns the LS450Coefficients object that contains the calibration constants of the LS450.

      • setLS450Coefficients

        void setLS450Coefficients(LS450Coefficients ls450Coefficients)
        Sets the array containing the 19 calibration coefficients for the LS450. This method sets the object only and does not write back to the LS450, Equivalent to the "Apply Button" Calls getInfo, which returns a String for each constant. the calibration constants of the LS450.
        Parameters:
        ls450Coefficients - the new array containing the 19 calibration coefficients for the LS450

      • getLS450Info

        java.lang.String getLS450Info(int index)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Queries any of the 22 stored spectrometer configuration variables.
        Parameters:
        index - The configuration index of the stored spectrometer variables.
        Returns:
        The data returned from the Query request.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the plugin cannot communicate with the spectrometer.

      • setLS450Info

        void setLS450Info(int index,
                  java.lang.String str)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes any of the 22 stored spectrometer configuration variables to internal RAM. The 22 configuration variables are indexed as described in the Query Calibration Constants. The information to be stored is transferred as ASCII information. This information is lost when power is turned off. To save the coefficients to the LS450 call setAllLS450Info method, then call saveInfo which write the stored calibration in volatile memory to EEPROM.
        Parameters:
        index - The configuration index of the stored spectrometer variables.
        str - The data to be written to the configuration variable
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the info cannot be set.

      • setAllLS450Info

        void setAllLS450Info(LS450Coefficients ls450Coefficients)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Writes all of the 22 stored spectrometer configuration variables to internal RAM. This information is lost when power is turned off. To save all the coefficients to the LS450 call this method, then call saveInfo which write the stored calibration in volatile memory to EEPROM.
        Parameters:
        ls450Coefficients - the LS450Coefficients object that contains the calibration constants of the LS450.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the info cannot be set.

      • getAllLS450Info

        LS450Coefficients getAllLS450Info()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Gets all of the 22 stored spectrometer configuration variables from internal RAM.
        Returns:
        the LS450Coefficients object that contains the calibration constants of the LS450.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the info cannot be set.

      • loadInfo

        void loadInfo()
       throws java.io.IOException
        This command instructs the microcontroller to read the calibration coefficients from the USB-LS450 and store them in internal volatile memory.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the plugin cannot communicate with the spectrometer.

      • saveInfo

        void saveInfo()
       throws java.io.IOException
        This command instructs the microcontroller to write the calibration coefficients to the EEPROM on the USB-LS450. This command requires 3.5 seconds to complete, during this time no other commands should be sent to the USB2000.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the plugin cannot communicate with the spectrometer.

      • loadLS450CoefficientsFromEEPROM

        void loadLS450CoefficientsFromEEPROM()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        This command calls loadInfo, which instructs the microcontroller to read the calibration coefficients from the USB-LS450 and store them in internal volatile memory. Then volatile memory is read in by calling getLS450Info and load all cariables into an LS450Coefficient object. This method should be called when the user wishes to reset the variables that are stored in the LS450 RAM (volatile memory). After this method is called, getLS450Coefficients will return the reset object.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an error communicating with the spectrometer

      • getO2ProbeCalibrationCoefficients

        double[] getO2ProbeCalibrationCoefficients()
        Gets the O2 probe calibration coefficients. These will be lost when the program exits unless they are subsequently written with setLS450Coefficients().
        Returns:
        O2 probe calibration coefficients stored within the spectrometer.

      • setO2ProbeCalibrationCoefficients

        void setO2ProbeCalibrationCoefficients(double[] coefficients)
        Sets the O2 probe calibration coefficients. These will be lost when the program exits unless they are subsequently written with setLS450Coefficients().
        Parameters:
        coefficients - O2 probe calibration coefficients stored within the spectrometer.
